articles.title: PGP-14 establishes a polar lipid permeability barrier within the C. elegans pharyngeal cuticle
articles.description: Author summary An infinite number of small molecules have the potential to threaten life. Not surprisingly then, animals have evolved multiple mechanisms to defend against such threats. One defense mechanism employed by many animals is the creation of an oute…
